text: Hianagi Ra Anumzamo'a amanage huno Amaziagagura hianki antahio, A'kamo'a ama rankumapi savri huno monkote huno vano hanigeno, bainati kazinteti ne'mofaka'a zamahe fri vaganere'za mopaka'a refko huza eri vagaregahaze. Ana hanagenka kagra rurega vahe mopafi ufrigahane. Hagi Israeli vahe'mo'za mopazmia atre'za rurega kina ome hu'za mani'neza anantega frigahaze.
